posts.postText:
Well, a long time ago, i stumbled across this website: http://www.keaton-world.com/
I looked at it, and i gave it a try.
Turns out this guy makes the  worst  animations ive seen.
I checked out his music , and ever since that day five years ago, i check for new music all the time!
Theres something about his music that I really enjoy, not like, "i like dis stuff" more like "DIS STUFF IS TEH BEST"
You should check it out.
 Now. 
  Funtastic Power!

I used music from there like 2 or 3 years ago.

 Edit: 
wow it was from 2007 lol.
